subtitle: An easy dessert using creamy Greek yogurt and Cointreau.

method.text: Place the chocolate in a heatproof bowl over a pan of simmering water. Heat for 3-5 min until melted.
Remove from the heat. Leave to cool slightly. Stir in the yogurt until smooth. Fold in the pecans and Cointreau.
Spoon the mixture into individual shallow serving glasses or into one large dish. Chill well before serving.

title: White chocolate and pecan mousse
